com.yzong.dsf14.RMIFramework.examples

Interface CalculatorServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RMIRemoteObject, RMIRemoteStub
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CalculatorServer_stub, CalculatorServerImpl

    public interface CalculatorServer
extends RMIRemoteStub
    CalculatorServer is the interface of the actual implementation of the corresponding RMI Object, and it extends RMIRemoteStub for RMI Stub creation.
    Author:
    Jimmy Zong

      • secretMethod

        int secretMethod(java.lang.Object srv,
               int x)
                 throws RMIInvocationException
        This method tests invoking an RMI method with another RMI object as parameter. By calling this method, the RMI framework passes the parameter by Reference instead of by Value. It returns the length of the ZipCodeList of the ZipCodeServer instance, plus the second parameter x.
        Parameters:
        srv - ZipCodeServer object whose length we wish to examine
        x - Value to add to the length of ZipCodeList
        Returns:
        Length of ZipCodeList plus the second parameter
        Throws:
        RMIInvocationException
